content.rendered:
Our Fleet

Our fleet of over 22 luxury and semi luxury coaches are designed to meet the highest passenger transportation specifications and are maintained by our group of highly qualified technicians and mechanics. All Stallion Cruise coaches are fully installed with 24hr satellite tracking.

We have a solid branch network which covers Harare, Bulawayo, Gweru, Kwekwe, Victoria Falls and Johannesburg which allows for maximum flexibility and convenience when booking as well as making enquiries.

The seating capacity and key features of our fleet are as follows:
